    matrix, y, y2, wordlist = generate_bag_of_words('xret_tails.txt')
    matrix = np.array(matrix)
    y2 = np.array(y2)
    #stepwise regression on bag of words
    clf = linear_model.Lars()
    clf.fit(matrix, y2)
    for i in range(len(clf.coef_)):
        if clf.coef_[i] != 0:
            print wordlist[i]
            print clf.coef_[i]
